## core-extensions package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [BaseKeymapExtension](./core-extensions.basekeymapextension.md) | Provides the expected default key mappings to the editor. |
|  [BlockquoteExtension](./core-extensions.blockquoteextension.md) |  |
|  [BoldExtension](./core-extensions.boldextension.md) |  |
|  [BulletListExtension](./core-extensions.bulletlistextension.md) |  |
|  [CodeBlockExtension](./core-extensions.codeblockextension.md) |  |
|  [CodeExtension](./core-extensions.codeextension.md) |  |
|  [CompositionExtension](./core-extensions.compositionextension.md) | This allow composition events to delete inline nodes using gboard on Android devices. |
|  [DropCursorExtension](./core-extensions.dropcursorextension.md) | Create a plugin that, when added to a ProseMirror instance, causes a decoration to show up at the drop position when something is dragged over the editor. |
|  [GapCursorExtension](./core-extensions.gapcursorextension.md) | Create a gap cursor plugin. |
|  [HardBreakExtension](./core-extensions.hardbreakextension.md) |  |
|  [HeadingExtension](./core-extensions.headingextension.md) |  |
|  [HistoryExtension](./core-extensions.historyextension.md) | This extension provides undo and redo commands and inserts a plugin which handles history related actions. |
|  [HorizontalRuleExtension](./core-extensions.horizontalruleextension.md) |  |
|  [ItalicExtension](./core-extensions.italicextension.md) |  |
|  [LinkExtension](./core-extensions.linkextension.md) |  |
|  [ListItemExtension](./core-extensions.listitemextension.md) |  |
|  [NodeCursorExtension](./core-extensions.nodecursorextension.md) | This extension makes it possible to navigate with the arrow keys between nodes. |
|  [OrderedListExtension](./core-extensions.orderedlistextension.md) |  |
|  [ParagraphExtension](./core-extensions.paragraphextension.md) | The paragraph is one of the essential building blocks for a prosemirror editor and by default it is provided to all editors. |
|  [PlaceholderExtension](./core-extensions.placeholderextension.md) |  |
|  [PositionTrackerExtension](./core-extensions.positiontrackerextension.md) | Applies a placeholder to a position in the document for actions that might take a while to complete.<!-- -->An example of this would be uploading an image. From when the upload starts to when it finally completes a lot can happen in the editor. This extension and it's helper functions allow the editor to keep track of where the image should actually be inserted. |
|  [SSRHelperExtension](./core-extensions.ssrhelperextension.md) | This extension makes it easier to add SSR transformations to the editor. |
|  [StrikeExtension](./core-extensions.strikeextension.md) |  |
|  [TrailingNodeExtension](./core-extensions.trailingnodeextension.md) | Ensure that there's always a trailing paragraph at the end of the document.<!-- -->Why? In some scenarios it is difficult to place a cursor after the last element. This ensures there's always space to select the position afterward. |
|  [UnderlineExtension](./core-extensions.underlineextension.md) |  |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ALIGN\_PATTERN](./core-extensions.align_pattern.md) | Regex for accepting a value as a valid alignment name. |
|  [baseExtensions](./core-extensions.baseextensions.md) | Base extensions are automatically injected into the default RemirrorEditor.<!-- -->To override them, you can either add your own extension with the same extensionName or you can turn off all of the base extensions. |
|  [cloneSSRElement](./core-extensions.clonessrelement.md) | Clone SSR elements ignoring the top level Fragment |
|  [convertToPt](./core-extensions.converttopt.md) | Converts a style value for size into into the same <code>pt</code>.<!-- -->TODO is it really important to make fonts print media friendly? |
|  [createTrailingNodePlugin](./core-extensions.createtrailingnodeplugin.md) | Create the paragraph plugin which can check the end of the document and insert a new node. |
|  [CSS\_ROTATE\_PATTERN](./core-extensions.css_rotate_pattern.md) |  |
|  [DEFAULT\_TRANSFORMATIONS](./core-extensions.default_transformations.md) | The default transformations which are applied when none are passed. |

|  [defaultTrailingNodeExtensionOptions](./core-extensions.defaulttrailingnodeextensionoptions.md) |  |
|  [EMPTY\_CSS\_VALUE](./core-extensions.empty_css_value.md) | Values which can safely be ignored when styling nodes. |
|  [EMPTY\_NODE\_CLASS\_NAME](./core-extensions.empty_node_class_name.md) | Used to denote a node is empty.<!-- -->Currently used by the placeholder extension. |

|  [FONT\_PT\_SIZES](./core-extensions.font_pt_sizes.md) | The default font sizes for the editor. |
|  [INDENT\_ATTRIBUTE](./core-extensions.indent_attribute.md) | The attribute to use for storing the indent value. |
|  [INDENT\_LEVELS](./core-extensions.indent_levels.md) | The levels of indentation supported by default. Can be overridden. |
|  [INDENT\_MARGIN\_PT\_SIZE](./core-extensions.indent_margin_pt_size.md) | The size of the default indentation size (in pt). |
|  [injectBrIntoEmptyParagraphs](./core-extensions.injectbrintoemptyparagraphs.md) | This utility maps through the SSR element and injects break tags into all empty p tags. |
|  [isGapCursorSelection](./core-extensions.isgapcursorselection.md) | Predicate checking whether the selection is a GapCursor |
|  [LINE\_SPACING\_VALUES](./core-extensions.line_spacing_values.md) | The default line spacing values. |
|  [marginToIndent](./core-extensions.margintoindent.md) | Converts the left margin into an indentation level. |
|  [MAX\_INDENT\_LEVEL](./core-extensions.max_indent_level.md) | The default maximum level of indentation allowed. |
|  [MIN\_INDENT\_LEVEL](./core-extensions.min_indent_level.md) | The min indentation level. |
|  [NODE\_CURSOR\_DEFAULTS](./core-extensions.node_cursor_defaults.md) | A list of nodes that need special treatment for composition events on android and also for arrow key presses between items in general. Used by both the CompositionExtension and NodeCursorExtension |
|  [PIXEL\_TO\_PT\_RATIO](./core-extensions.pixel_to_pt_ratio.md) | The default pixel to pt font size ratio. https://github.com/chanzuckerberg/czi-prosemirror/blob/52e34840d73fccc46637314bf4b4be71147112d4/src/convertToCSSPTValue.js\#L7 |
|  [PT\_TO\_PIXEL\_RATIO](./core-extensions.pt_to_pixel_ratio.md) | The default pt to pixel ratio. |
|  [SIZE\_PATTERN](./core-extensions.size_pattern.md) | Regex for matching sizes in the DOM. |

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [BaseExtensions](./core-extensions.baseextensions.md) | The BaseExtensions union type shows the extension types available as base extensions.<!-- -->This union type is useful when paired with your own types to provide better typechecking throughout your codebase. |
